programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Fuk Wor Triad member Ting and Senior Inspector Tuen of the Regional Anti Triad Unit are moles that have been planted by the rival party. After years undercover, both are eager to start new lives.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Despite living with Spinal Muscular Atrophy, Ben Lou transcends physical limitations through his extraordinary brilliance in mathematics and physics. He shares his inspiring journey, showcasing how resilience and intellect have turned adversity into a catalyst for groundbreaking innovation.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie learns that the deleted files on her computer were restored shortly before Yang Dong committed suicide and realizes that was aware of her secret identity. Shi Qiang commands the arrest operation as Wang Miao attends the ETO meeting.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie proposed using the sun to amplify the radio tranmissions, but her idea is rejected. She secretly implemented it and finally on October 21, 1979, received a message from another world: a repeated warning of not to answer.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Jia Qi is jealous as she sees the way Dong Yu meticulously caring for Mandy. She brings Dong Yu to the music hall where they met for the first time and brings up old memories, expressing that she wants to start afresh with him. However, Dong Yu tells Jia Qi that he no longer has feelings for her. Jia Qi asks Dong Yu if he likes Mandy and he onfirms it. Jia Qi is disappointed.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Sharon is unhappy that Mandy destroyed her family and confronts her to mock her for being the same as before, condoning her husband's affair to prevent losing her status as Mrs. Xie. Mandy advises Sharon to come to her senses, telling her truthfully that she has already understood these actions as a form of illusion and self-comfort. Dong Yu's heart breaks upon hearing these words.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Fuk Wor Triad member Ting and Senior Inspector Tuen of the Regional Anti Triad Unit are moles that have been planted by the rival party. After years undercover, both are eager to start new lives.

programme.title: American Moments
programme.desc: Get an inside look into the 9th China-US Cultural and Entertainment Summit, listen to the story of Xu Zheng filming "Dying to Survive", and hit an awards dinner with Hollywood celebrities.

programme.title: Princess and the Seven Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven kung fu masters must defeat the enemy and save a warlord who refuses to side with the Japanese enemies.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Visionary designer Sue Wong and Tulane University professor Shieh Hsieh share their experiences blending Chinese heritage with American innovation. Their captivating stories transcend cultural boundaries, harmoniously weaving tradition and modernity into inspiring narratives of creativity and transformative collaboration.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Wang Xuan considers Su Jin Er as her sister and notices that her personality has changed.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Wang Xuan has intentions to bring Yiu Xiu and Song Huai En together with the approval of Xiao Qi.

programme.title: Modern Dynasty
programme.desc: Yan Sum uses Suk-yin to let Oi-foon know Lok-yee’s mother is Kwai-lin.

programme.title: Modern Dynasty
programme.desc: Yan Sum tells Yan Shing to get rid of Kai-lai’s dead body, causing Yan Shing to feel anxious all day long.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: On Radar Peak, Ye Wen Jie calmly taps the button to restore the Three-Body system, and determines the destiny of mankind. After Ye Wen Jie finished telling this history, the hall fell silent. Meanwhile, Shi Qiang leads his team into the ETO meeting.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie is called in by the Political Commissar Lei Zhi Cheng who informs her he wants to claim that he was the one who discovered the message received by Ye Wen Jie. Later, she fakes a malfunction and is surprised when her husband shows up.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Miao Miao finds a lump on her breast but treats it lightly. She is later dragged by her Zumba mates to get it checked and the doctor advises her to do a biopsy, after discovering a shadow in her breast. Miao Miao is worried that she may have breast cancer and becomes absent-minded, doing weird things often, causing You Nian to feel confused.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Xie Ning cannot accept the fact that Dong Yu will become her father. Mandy rejects Dong Yu for her daughter's sake. Dong Yu tells Mandy to give each other time instead. They decide to maintain a distance to avoid agitating Xie Ning. However, Xie Ning finds out, causing a conflict between herself and Mandy.

programme.desc: Seven kung fu masters must defeat the enemy and save a warlord who refuses to side with the Japanese enemies.

programme.title: American Moments
programme.desc: The Los Angeles International Auto Show displays many fascinating cars and changing technologies. Also, hear a story about the border wall between America and Mexico.

programme.desc: Noelle joins Jennie Chang to have a Cantonese style seafood feast at the 30-year-old restaurant 888 Seafood.
